Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small MaltsevOperator AllSmallMaltsevOperator is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic MaltsevOperator of orders 2 to 3.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallMaltsevOperator">
The output maltsevoperator are represented by its operation table for , as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small MaltsevOperator
"IsASmallMaltsevOperator" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic MaltsevOperator of orders 2 to 3. It returns true if the model is a Small MaltsevOperator, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallMaltsevOperator">
